      Methods in com.connectsdk.discovery with parameters of type DiscoveryProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DiscoveryProviderListener.onServiceAdded(DiscoveryProvider provider, ServiceDescription serviceDescription)
      This method is called when the DiscoveryProvider discovers a service that matches one of its DeviceService filters.
      void DiscoveryManager.onServiceAdded(DiscoveryProvider provider, ServiceDescription serviceDescription) 
      void DiscoveryProviderListener.onServiceDiscoveryFailed(DiscoveryProvider provider, ServiceCommandError error)
      This method is called on any error/failure within the DiscoveryProvider.
      void DiscoveryManager.onServiceDiscoveryFailed(DiscoveryProvider provider, ServiceCommandError error) 
      void DiscoveryProviderListener.onServiceRemoved(DiscoveryProvider provider, ServiceDescription serviceDescription)
      This method is called when the DiscoveryProvider's internal mechanism loses reference to a service that matches one of its DeviceService filters.
      void DiscoveryManager.onServiceRemoved(DiscoveryProvider provider, ServiceDescription serviceDescription) 
      Method parameters in com.connectsdk.discovery with type arguments of type DiscoveryProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DiscoveryManager.registerDeviceService(Class<? extends DeviceService> deviceClass, Class<? extends DiscoveryProvider> discoveryClass)
      Registers a DeviceService with DiscoveryManager and tells it which DiscoveryProvider to use to find it.
